update user_team_info
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},

is_virtual = #{isVirtual,jdbcType=INTEGER},
